name: Mongo_Beefhead_Tribesman
content:
The Mongo Beefhead Tribesman was a member of the nearly-extinct Mongo Beefhead Tribe from Tatooine. The tribesman, like the rest of the group, supported the Rebel Alliance.
The Mongo Beefhead Tribesman was a prototype action figure envisioned by Kenner for the canceled 1986 toy line, The Epic Continues. Kenner's designers created the figure by taking the head of a "Squid Head"  action figure, cutting off its neck, and turning it to face the front. The head was then combined with the torso of a Squid Head figure, the arms from a "Hammer Head" , and the chest pack from a 4-LOM figure.
